alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Dinwiddie; Henrico; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 2:25PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia and south central Virginia, including the following counties and independent cities, in central Virginia, Chesterfield, City of Colonial Heights, City of Richmond and Henrico. In south central Virginia, City of Hopewell, City of Petersburg, Dinwiddie and Prince George. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 222 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated moderate to heavy rain in the area. In addition, VDOT is reporting delays due to standing water in the City of Richmond and northern portions of Chesterfield County. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen since this morning. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. during the next two hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richmond, Petersburg, Hopewell, Colonial Heights, Chester, Virginia State University, Fort Lee, Downtown Richmond, Virginia Commonwealth University, Highland Springs, Virginia Union University, Bon Air, University Of Richmond, Mechanicsville, Tuckahoe, Prince George, Bellwood, Ettrick, Bensley and Chesterfield Court House. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Dinwiddie; Henrico; Prince George
